item.title: Automate Security Workflows in Microsoft Sentinel with BlinkOps
item.description: Automate Security Workflows in Microsoft Sentinel with BlinkOps Security teams are under increasing pressure to respond faster to threats while managing growing complexity across their environments. Microsoft Sentinel’s elevated integration with BlinkOps helps address this challenge by enabling AI-powered, no-code automation that simplifies and accelerates security operations. Introducing BlinkOps for Microsoft Sentinel BlinkOps is a no-code security automation platform designed for security and platform operations teams.
